name: 1351: The Darkest Days
description:
Attend to the King's plea!
Find the cure to the deadly illness that curses the Land!
By following the King's Lore of Alchemy, you will:

unveil The Secret Knowledge
find The Vessel of Hermes
witness The Lumen Naturae

only then, you will be able to summon The Red Lion,
the Great Elixir – the Cure to every Illness – the path to Immortality – the Key to Creation!

During your journey,
you will learn from Nature - become wiser, and expand your Divine Consciousness.
You will face the dreadful Miasma, and engage in the art of Transmutation to survive.
You will gather the Souls of the Elements and summon The Great Work of Alchemy to reveal the most sacred Wisdom!

The task will not be easy,
but you, The Alchemist, shall prevail!

Features:

  • Turn-based Survival Strategy
  • High replay value through randomization
  • Original Game Mechanics
  • Original Graphics
  • Original Music
  • Based on Alchemy Lore
  • Player's Instruction Manual
  • Created using  GB Studio version 1.2.1

Game status is currently 100% complete and fully playable.
Digital Release Version: R28.
New versions might come available to address any bugs that might show up.

Thanks for your support!
